attributes.action: In all schools in uk have fast food Friday where any fast food is available.
attributes.additional_details: It will get school children to be couraged to be in school and if you are not in school for more than 3 days then you cannot get fast food.
attributes.background: Let all school have fast food like McDonald’s and kfc in the lunch hall on a Friday. Giving the name fast food Friday.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the individual school, and not something which the UK Government or Parliament is directly responsible for.
